Inexact seek allows the player to seek to positions faster with reduced precision. Seeking for 5, 15 or 25 seconds doesn\'t work with this

Disable Android Auto connection to avoid notification issues on on Android 12 and older.\n\nAfter re-enabling this option, you must restart the app and reconnect to the car for the change to take effect.

If enabled, PipePipe will try to add an auto-translated subtitle track in your default content language. This makes video loading slightly slower.

A FLOSS Android app to let you browse YouTube, NicoNico and BiliBili freely
Whether you have ideas of; translation, design changes, code cleaning, or real heavy code changes—help is always welcome. The more is done the better it gets!

I have put in my best effort to provide you with the best user experience, but you have the opportunity to make PipePipe even better by donating. With sufficient donations, I can dedicate more time to developing the project.

NewPipe is copyleft libre software: You can use, study, share, and improve it at will. Specifically you can redistribute and/or modify it under the terms of the GNU General Public License as published by the Free Software Foundation, either version 3 of the License, or (at your option) any later version.

Disable media tunneling if you experience a black screen or stuttering on video playback

Send a visitor data cookie on all YouTube Desktop requests. Can be used for reproducing A/B tests
Shows a crash option when using the player

Import YouTube subscriptions from Google takeout: 
 
1. Go to this URL: %1$s 
2. Log in when asked 
3. Click on "All data included", then on "Deselect all", then select only "subscriptions" and click "OK" 
4. Click on "Next step" and then on "Create export" 
5. Click on the "Download" button after it appears 
6. Click on IMPORT FILE below and select the downloaded .zip file 
7. [If the .zip import fails] Extract the .csv file (usually under "YouTube and YouTube Music/subscriptions/subscriptions.csv"), click on IMPORT FILE below and select the extracted csv file

Import a SoundCloud profile by typing either the URL or your ID:

1. Enable "desktop mode" in a web-browser (the site is not available for mobile devices)
2. Go to this URL: %1$s
3. Log in when asked
4. Copy the profile URL you were redirected to.
Keep in mind this operation can be network expensive.\n\nDo you want to continue?

In order to comply with the European General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR), we hereby draw your attention to PipePipe\'s privacy policy. Please read it carefully. \nYou must accept it to send us the bug report.

Time after last update before a subscription is considered outdated — %s
The author\'s account has been terminated.\nPipePipe will not be able to load this feed in the future.\nDo you want to unsubscribe from this channel?
The fast feed mode does not provide more info on this.
Fetch from dedicated feed when available
Available in some services, it is usually much faster but may return a limited amount of items and often incomplete information (e.g. no duration, item type, no live status)

Do you think feed loading is too slow\? If so, try enabling fast loading (you can change it in settings or by pressing the button below). 
 
PipePipe offers two feed loading strategies: 
• Fetching the whole subscription channel, which is slow but complete. 
• Using a dedicated service endpoint, which is fast but usually not complete. 
 
The difference between the two is that the fast one usually lacks some information, like the item's duration or type (can't distinguish between live videos and normal ones) and it may return less items. 
 
YouTube is an example of a service that offers this fast method with its RSS feed. 
 
So the choice boils down to what you prefer: speed or precise information.
Tabs to fetch when updating the feed. This option has no effect if a channel is updated using fast mode.
Automatically skip sponsors in videos. Works for YouTube and BiliBili.
The url to use when querying the SponsorBlock API. This must be set for SponsorBlock to work.
Show a toast notification when a sponsor is automatically skipped.

This is the URL that will be queried when the application needs to know which parts of a video to skip.\n\nYou can set the official URL by clicking the \'Use Official\' option below, though it is highly recommended you view SponsorBlock\'s privacy policy before you do.
Clear the list of uploaders SponsorBlock will ignore.
Are you sure you want to clear the whitelist?
Are you sure you want to reset the category colors?
Are you sure you want to clear your new segment?
Your segment has been submitted.\n\nIt might take some time for your submission to appear in the video the next time you open it.
Mark the start of a segment
Mark the end of a segment
Customize which video segments to skip, along with their color markings on the seek bar.
Paid promotion, paid referrals and direct advertisements. Not for self-promotion or free shoutouts to causes/creators/websites/products they like.
An interval without actual content. Could be a pause, static frame, repeating animation. This should not be used for transitions containing information or be used on music videos.
Credits or when the YouTube endcards appear. Not for spoken conclusions. This should not include useful content. This should not be used on music videos.
When there is a short reminder to like, subscribe or follow them in the middle of content. If it is long or about something specific, it should be under self promotion instead.
The part of the video that most people are looking for. Similar to "Video starts at x" comments.
Similar to "sponsor" except for unpaid or self promotion. This includes sections about merchandise, donations, or information about who they collaborated with.
Only for use in music videos. This includes introductions or outros in music videos.
Quick recap of previous episodes, or a preview of what\'s coming up later in the current video. Meant for edited together clips, not for spoken summaries.
This is for tangential scenes added only for filler or humor that are not required to understand the main content of the video.
Represents a new segment ready to be submitted.
Rewinding the video back to automatically-skipped segments will pause skipping until the segment ends.
Show buttons on-screen to manually skip/unskip segments. Enabling this is recommended when configuring SponsorBlock Categories to be skipped manually.

Always try to enqueue next partition
Manage some ExoPlayer settings. These changes require a player restart to take effect

Enable this option if you have decoder initialization issues, which falls back to lower-priority decoders if primary decoders initialization fail. This may result in poor playback performance than when using primary decoders
Always use ExoPlayer\'s video output surface setting workaround

This workaround releases and re-instantiates video codecs when a surface change occurs, instead of setting the surface to the codec directly. Already used by ExoPlayer on some devices with this issue, this setting has only an effect on Android 6 and higher\n\nEnabling this option may prevent playback errors when switching the current video player or switching to fullscreen
Play & download(for premium contents / higher video resolutions & audio qualities)
Do you want to enable update checker? You can disable it in settings.
Playlist downloading is still in beta. NEVER use it to download playlists with 50+ items.
Priority: Issues on GitHub/CodeBerg > Emails with clear title, polite content and bug report > Bug report only emails. \nBug report only emails will not receive replies.
Found a match for the error you encountered
Only auto queue videos shorter than 6 min
Please enable notifications for this app to ensure it functions normally. We will only alert you when necessary.
Automatically shuffle your local playlists when playing in the background

### Bug Fixes

- Mini player is not shown if start playback in background/popup
- Playback not stopping when closing out video under certain conditions
- Shuffle/Repeat mode in notification is not correctly working under certain conditions
- Channel playlists only load 1 page (YouTube)
- Search not working (NicoNico) 
- Unexpected crasg under certain conditions

### Behavior

- Make the video playback able to recover from 403 error (YouTube) 
- Add a switch to control android auto, and disable android auto on android 12 and earlier versions by default
- Show auto translated subtitles by default
- Improve the speed when navigating in a large local playlist
- Try additional 3 page if all the items in current search page is filtered
Thank you for using PipePipe! If you find it useful, please consider becoming a supporter on Ko-Fi. Your support is important to me and helps me add more exciting new features. Every bit counts! 😇

Your IP is blocked by YouTube. Try using a VPN or logging in through Settings to continue.

If your device has support, enabling advanced formats can reduce data consumption and provide higher resolutions. \nWEBM or AV1 must be enabled to show 2k/4k contents on YouTube. \nUse a format that your device doesn\'t support will result in a black screen or crash.
Make video position fixed when scrolling comments
Your IP has been temporarily blocked by YouTube. For a period of time, you will experience issues when playing certain videos. If the error persists, please log in through Settings to continue.
Add the keywords you want to block here, separated by commas
Add the channel names you want to block here, separated by commas
Paste your token here. You can get your token through a Ko-fi donation.
Bypass YouTube IP blocking & age restrictions without login
Pre-releases update faster, but may contain some bugs

YouTube keeps changing its encryption recently, which can mess up extraction and playback. When we spot these issues, we’ll jump on fixing them and roll out a new version as fast as we can. To stay up to date, we suggest turning on the ‘Check for Updates’ option so you get the fix as soon as it’s ready. (Updates via F-Droid takes 3-10 days longer due to the build process.)
The video has not released yet.
Remove short videos from results. Only work for YouTube.

It looks like something went a little wrong.
• The network connection might be a little unstable.
• You can try switching to another network.
• Please double-check your router or Wi‑Fi settings.
• The server may be under maintenance right now.
• Please wait a moment and try again.
• If it keeps happening, we'll fix it as quickly as we can.
• The feature needs the related permission to work.
• You can re-enable it in system settings.
• We will always keep your privacy safe.
• This might just be a tiny temporary hiccup.
• Restarting the app usually solves it.
• If it persists, feel free to reach out to us.
